entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 3:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
